snippet: More than 550 people have filed claims against the Archdiocese of Milwaukee, the largest group against any of the eight dioceses that have declared bankruptcy in the sexual abuse scandal.
abstract: More than 550 people who say they were sexually abused by Roman Catholic priests or church employees have filed claims against the Archdiocese of Milwaukee in bankruptcy proceedings; if the archdiocese has its way in court, as many as 95 percent of the claims could be dismissed.
lead_paragraph: More than 550 people have filed claims against the Archdiocese of Milwaukee, the largest group against any of the eight dioceses that have declared bankruptcy in the sexual abuse scandal.

headline.seo: Milwaukee Archdiocese Angers Many By Contesting Abuse Claims
headline.main: Archdiocese Angers Many by Contesting Abuse Claims
headline.print_headline: Archdiocese Angers Many By Contesting Abuse Claims
